cast.name: 克里斯·塔什马 Chris Tashima
弗朗克西斯·周 François Chau

introduction: In the year 2244, alien scientists attempt to save the Japanese American (JA) Human species from extinction by breeding a frozen 20th-century Sansei (3rd generation JA) Beauty Queen from Gardena, CA, with the sole-surviving Kusei (9th generation JA) male brought back from exile on the planet Topanzanar.This is one of the earliest works from co-screenwriter Karen Tei Yamashita, who would go on to write several produced plays as well as many published novels.2244年，外星科学家试图拯救日裔美国人（Japanese American，JA）这一濒临灭绝的人种，方法是让一位冬眠中的、来自20世纪加州Gardena的第三代日裔Beauty Queen与从异星流放中被召回的、唯一幸存的第九代日裔之间繁殖出下一代。本片编剧之一系著名日裔美国作家山下凯伦（Karen Tei Yamashita），为第三代日裔移民，目前任加州大学圣克鲁兹分校文学和创意写作教授，主讲创意写作与美国亚裔文学课程，著有《巴西丸》《橘子回归线》等小说。
